title: Spawning External Processes in Go | Challenge
description: In some cases, Go programs need to spawn non-Go processes. This challenge aims to demonstrate how to spawn external processes in Go.

meta.title: Spawning External Processes in Go | Programming Tutorials | Challenge
meta.description: Learn how to spawn external processes and collect their output in Go programming language. Explore the requirements and example usage.
meta.keywords: Go programming, external processes, process spawning, process output, command execution, programming tutorials
